intro: This document serves as a nomenclature guideline for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's Coastal Zones product, focusing on land cover and land use (LC/LU) classification. It provides a detailed description of all level 5 classes within the Coastal Zones LC/LU nomenclature, outlining their geographical characteristics, available input datasets, and the methods used to interpret these classes. This guideline aims to ensure consistency and accuracy in the mapping and monitoring of coastal environments across the EEA39 countries by providing clear definitions and mapping rules for the 71 thematic LC/LU classes.
